conbody.p: On the Resources tab of a System page, you get an overview of the system's resources. A resource is any physical component of the system.
By default, the first Controller Node of the rack is selected. Click any other device in the rack to consult its summary and inventory.
In case of a multi-site system, you can select the rack by clicking the name above the rack image. This opens a menu with the list of racks in the system. Select rack
